comments:
I got the below exception during an attempt to hyperlink (Ctrl-MouseOver) in a JSP editor.  I can't seem to create a stand-alone  test case but it may have to do with taglibs; also, it seemed like closing and re-opening a project contributed.  On surface, there needs to be an if check added to TaglibHyperlinkDetector.getCurrentNode() when it calls getExistingModelForRead.  This method can return null.  Perhaps there's an IDocument lifecycle problem (created or aggravated by closing/re-opening the project).
